name: COVACURE Beach Tent Sun Shelter for 3-4 Person - UPF 50+ UV Protection Beach Shade, Waterproof & Lightweight, Easy Setup Portable Sun Canopy for Camping, Fishing, Beach
short_description: 【Extra Large Capacity Outdoor Tent】Our Extra Large Beach Tent is 95X79X48 inch, this oversized beach tent is 40% larger than most pop-up tents on the market and can accommodate 3 adults and 2 children.Whether it's at the beach, camping, festivals or sporting events, the COVACURE Beach Tent is ideal for family outings or group adventures.

【UPF 50+ Sun Protection & Ultimate Privacy】 Crafted from premium sun-proof material coated polyester, our beach tent sun shelter blocks 98% of harmful UV rays and reflects heat for superior sun protection. Unlike flimsy umbrellas, its enclosed design creates a sand-free sanctuary for changing clothes or escaping harsh sunlight, wind, and prying eyes.

【Enhanced Wind Resistance & Easy Set Up】NEW 2025 UPGRADE COVACURE Beach Tent combines 7mm reinforced fiberglass poles with 6 stakes & 2 heavy-duty sandbags and 2 tent poles, you won't be disturbed by the tent that being blown by the wind. And the two side pockets for storing your phones, keys, cards etc. Even if you are wearing a stylish beach swimsuit without pockets, your things have their place.The easy set up design makes it great for taking fishing, to the beach or in your garden.

【360° Breathability & Convenient Design】The 4-sided ventilation design features 3 large mesh windows and a fully opening fourth side that offers great airflow. This is particularly nice on those blistering summer days when shade doesn’t seem to be enough to keep you cool when you might need a little extra airflow. Our beach tent comes equipped with stroge bags, stake holes, and multiple interior hooks for added convenience, allowing you to hang lights, fans, or clothes.

【Portable & Trusted Choice】You can lounge all day long in the COVACURE beach shade, but when you decide to pack it up, the tent folds into a 15'' compact carry-all case with a shoulder strap, making your fun-filled day as convenient as possible. If you have any questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to contact us. We'll give you a best solution.

name: Elegear Beach Tent Sun Shelter with Canopy, 4-5 Person Pop Up Beach Tent, Easy Setup UPF 50+ UV Protection Portable Lightweight Double Silver Coating Beach Cabana Sun Shade Shelter - Sky Blue
short_description: Double the Space - Elegear Beach Tent Pop Up Shade boasts a unique built-in canopy design that not only offers top-notch sun protection but also provides twice the space of traditional beach tents, comfortably accommodating 4-5 people. Whether it's a family outing or a casual get-together with friends, you'll have plenty of room to relax without breaking a sweat.

Five Ways to Use - Our Beach Canopy Tent Sun Shade stands out with its innovative design, allowing you to effortlessly adjust the canopy, rear door zipper, and even fully enclose it to meet all your needs. With the canopy opened, you'll enjoy double the usable space, along with enhanced sun protection and ventilation, making it perfect for family or group gatherings. When you retract the canopy, the beach tent transforms into a regular size, ideal for smaller groups or couples.

Innovative External Snap-on Installation - Our Beach Tents Sun Shelter features a unique External Snap-on Installation System that is simpler and saves you half the time compared to traditional setup methods found in the market. With this innovative design, assembling your beach tent is a breeze, allowing you to spend less time setting up and more time enjoying your beach adventure.

360° Ventilation Design - Our beach tent features a considerate design with one openable rear door and two large-sized roll-up mesh windows. This configuration not only ensures excellent airflow from all directions but also provides a panoramic view of your surroundings. You'll stay cool and comfortable inside Elegear beach tent, no matter how hot it gets outside.

UPF 50+ and Waterproof - Crafted from 190T double-layer silver-coated and waterproof PU2000 polyester, our Beach Pop Up Tent offers comprehensive protection from both the sun and unexpected drizzles. With an impressive UPF 50+ sun protection rating and built-in cooling effect that effectively blocks 99% of UV rays while lowering temperatures by up to 9°F inside the tent for beach, you can trust our beach sun shelter to keep you comfortable and shielded from the elements.

More Wind Resistance and Durability - By enhancing the fiberglass rod thickness to 8.5mm, we've significantly improved the stability and durability of our Beach compared to other beach tents with standard 6.0mm rods. Additionally, our beach tent is equipped with sandbags, stakes, and ropes, ensuring superior wind resistance. With these robust components, our beach tent's wind resistance level is increased by 50% compared to others, and its lifespan is extended by more than double!

Portable and Widely Use - Once folded, our Beach Shade Tent transforms into a small package, easily carried by hand or stowed in a bag, suitcase, or strapped onto a backpack. Its compact size makes it convenient to transport wherever your adventures take you, ensuring hassle-free travel and setup. Plus, its versatility allows for multi-scene use, such as at the beach, camping, parks, lakesides, hiking, fishing, and more, making it the perfect companion for all your outdoor activities.

Privacy Option - The extended front floor of our Beach Tent Canopy provides extra space for various activities and can be easily closed off with a zipper for privacy during intimate moments, such as breastfeeding or changing clothes. This convenient feature allows you to enjoy additional space and protection without compromising on comfort or convenience.

Thoughtful Design - Our Pop Up Tent Beach is equipped with a range of thoughtful features, including built-in mesh roll-up windows for ventilation, interior storage pockets, a roll-up zipped rear door, and internal hanging hooks. These design elements enhance your beach experience with a touch of luxury, ensuring convenience and comfort throughout your outing.

Worry-Free Satisfaction Service - If you encounter any quality or installation issues, please don't hesitate to contact us. Our dedicated team will strive to resolve them within 24 hours, ensuring your satisfaction. We are committed to providing you with a pleasant shopping experience!

name: Beach Tent Sun Shelter, Beach Shade Tent with UPF 50+ UV Protection for 2-3 Person, Portable & Easy Setup Cabana, 3 Roll Up Doors & 8mm Fiberglass Rods, Carry Bag Included
short_description: Super Value Beach Tent: Hoeada beach tent offers a spacious interior, larger than other beach tents in the same price range, accommodating up to 3 people. Easy to set up and carry, perfect for beach lovers who enjoy spending time with family and friends.

Waterproof and UPF 50+: Our beach tent is made of high-quality sun-proof polyester material with a UPF 50+ coating, effectively blocking heat and 98% of harmful UV rays, keeping you and your family safe from the sun. The water-rejecting fabric design provides temporary shelter in light rain, so please avoid use in heavy rain.

Windproof & Stability: The 8.0mm imported fiberglass frame is safer, more durable, rust-resistant, and keeps the tent stable and in shape even after long-term use. Our beach tent comes with sandbags, steel stakes, sand stakes, and ropes. They provide better ground grip and effective resistance against strong winds.

Easy Setup & Portability: Quick setup in minutes. Our beach tent is lightweight, easy to carry, and folds easily into a compact carry bag. With a small volume, it is convenient for travel and storage. Carry it anywhere you want to go and enjoy a beach trip with your family.

The extended front floor provides additional space for activities. When you need extra privacy or want to step away from the tent, simply zip up the zipper.

The fabric boasts excellent waterproof performance, allowing you to enjoy a cool and dry leisure space during outdoor activities.

Solid Structure & Windproof: Our beach shelter is equipped with 2 thickened fiberglass poles, 4 sandbags, 4 windproof ropes, and 12 ground pegs for an enhanced grip. The unique cross-support design improves the stability of the tent, which can resist strong winds, prevent collapse, and make your outdoor trip safer and more relaxing.

Easy Setup & Takedown: Without much time and effort, our beach tent sun shelter can be installed and disassembled in minutes. When folded, the beach shade tent is compact and can be put into a storage bag for easy carrying. Whether it's a beach trip, fishing, camping, picnic, or hiking, you can take it with you and start a wonderful outdoor trip.

name: Beach Tent, Portable Sun Shelter for 2/3/4/6-8 Person with UPF 50+ UV Protection, Easy Setup Waterproof Beach Shade Canopy Cabana for Family Outdoor and Picnics, Fishing with Carrying Bag
short_description: A Beach Essential: Our Compact Beach Tent is a must-have for any beach trip. Whether you're a solo beachgoer looking for your own space, a couple wanting to unwind, or a parent needing a safe, shaded spot for your little ones, this tent has you covered. Its compact size makes it easy to carry, and the cozy, private area it creates ensures a relaxing, hassle-free day at the beach.

Easy Setup & Portability:The Etto beach tent sets up and folds down in just 3 simple steps, making it the most user-friendly option for your beach adventures. Its compact design comes with a convenient storage bag, ensuring effortless transport and storage. Lightweight and hassle-free, it’s your perfect companion for stress-free beach days.

Distinctive Cross Design:A perfect blend of aesthetics and functionality. Our beach tent features high-quality silver-coated fabric, paired with an 8.0mm imported fiberglass frame, ensuring outstanding durability and corrosion resistance. Even in harsh weather conditions, the tent remains stable, offering you long-lasting comfort and protection.

Widely Versatile:Available in 4 sizes, the Etto beach tent is ideal for a variety of outdoor activities. Whether it’s a beach day, lakeside trip, camping adventure, fishing, hiking, sports events, music festivals, picnics, or outdoor parties, it handles them all with ease. It’s also perfect for family use in the backyard or at home, ensuring your outdoor moments are always comfortable and enjoyable.

Made of high-quality sun-proof coated fabric, the Etto beach tent effectively blocks up to 98% of harmful UV rays, offering UPF 50+ protection to keep you safe from the sun’s harmful effects. With 3 large roll-up mesh windows, the tent enhances airflow and helps maintain a cool interior, allowing you to enjoy the ocean breeze in comfort, even on the hottest days.
